```{r, include = FALSE}

```

```{r setup}
library(multimedia)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggraph)
exper <- demo_joy()
exper
```

```{r}
model <- multimedia(
  exper,
  outcomes = "PHQ",
  treatments = "treatment",
  mediators = starts_with("ASV")
)

model
```

```{r}
ggraph(model@edges) +
  geom_edge_link(arrow = arrow()) +
  geom_node_label(aes(label = name, fill = node_type))
```
